modName: Gold plated armor for jarls bodyguards
summary: This is a re texture of the Nord plate armor making it very golden. only jarls bodyguards  have them so  Bolgeir Bearclaw and Unmid Snow-Shod have the armor but also the jarl of riftens son Harrald has the armor because he is the type that would wear gold armor.
descriptionHtml:
This is a re texture of the Nord plate armor making it very golden. only some jarls bodyguards have the armor so Bolgeir Bearclaw and Unmid Snow-Shod have the armor but also the jarl of riftens son Harrald has the armor because he is the type that would wear gold armor.

This re texture is for both genders now but with a little change the armor is in the male style for both genders and the mesh has been changed for that. Because the only people that need it is the jarls bodyguards so its mostly a style thing to make them look bad ass.
author: Iain Duthie
